name: 2D Platformer Cam, Nacho and Nico BHS 2022
name_original: 2D Platformer Cam, Nacho and Nico BHS 2022
description:
Better with headphones as our game contains toe tappers. 

This is an insanely epic game as no art has been made everything you are seeing is a place holder, this is  a very basic start to get scripts feeling the way I want them to rather then a polished game. The first level is incredibly easy I just wanted to get death and win function. Next sprint I will implement Enemy Ai and a proper Level
